mapper.select: SELECT tpp.PROJECT_NAME,tpp.PROJECT_ADDR, tr.ID,tr.ROOM_SPACE,tr.rental,tr.ORIENTATION, tr.STRUCTURE,tr.pay_way FROM t_room tr INNER JOIN t_house th ON tr.HOUSE_ID = th.ID AND th.DEL_FLAG=0 INNER JOIN t_property_project tpp ON tr.PROPERTY_PROJECT_ID = tpp.ID AND tpp.DEL_FLAG=0 WHERE tr.DEL_FLAG=0 and tr.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
